thread.section_title: Royal Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Couldn't even get in contact with them
thread.title_full: Couldn't even get in contact with them - Review of Royal Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: itsme87
title: Couldn't even get in contact with them
text:
My sister and i booked for 8 nights in June through a deal on Groupon.
Cannot get a response from the hotel for a confirmation, after a month of trying. No response via email or Facebook and the phone no. on the website is seemingly disconnected.
Luckily we were able to pull our payment for the booking through Paypal.
What a shame!
